channel.title: Some questions about how MoparScape works
channel.description:
Don't know if this is the right section (not too many to choose from) so Iam sorry if it's not. I am currently learning about java coding and have a few questions I need help with.
1) How does MoparScape get the images of items/objects/npcs and stuff? Is it coming from a place on the runescape site? Surely the files can't be included with a server source download.
2) Any good sugguestions for websites to learn about java coding? I have been looking around, gathing bit from bit from different tutorials, guides, and things like that. Also I have been looking at the source of different private servers comparing them and also trying to figure out how certain things work, and why.
*Looks at loooong road ahead* :$
Thanks ;)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2007, 09:46:32 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know? =\
